title: Odd Crash in the Suez Canal | Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz & Ezra Levant | 3/25/21
description:
Pat joins Glenn and Stu to make their predictions about Biden’s first news conference and review the odd movement pattern of a cargo ship blocking the Suez Canal. Texas Sen. Ted Cruz joins to discuss the border crisis, face masks, and what he calls the “Corrupt Politicians Act.” More details are out about the Boulder murderer, and we haven’t heard the media use this narrative since the Obama years. Glenn argues that the Left’s anti-gun narrative may have come earlier than hoped. First Liberty Institute’s Michael Berry shares his insight on the dangers of painting even the military as “extremists.” Rebel News founder Ezra Levant shares how his news organization was being spied on by the U.S. Navy and the Canadian government.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
